settings.step_description: Choose from our diverse range of science-based certification programs. All courses are 100% online and self-paced to provide a flexible learning experience.
Build your resume + confidence as a trainer through NPTA's Apprenticeship program. Gain hands-on experience and learn directly from Canada's top leading trainers.

Now that you’re experienced and job-ready, start maximizing your earning potential. Join NPTA’s affiliate program and inspire others to sign up for our top-tier certification programs. Earn up to $600 for every successful referral.

settings.section_description: 3 Steps to Go From Your Desk to Your Dream Job Coaching Clients

settings.title: {{ product.metafields.custom.product_title_faqs.value }} FAQs
settings.footer_text: Can't find what you're looking for?

settings.name: Alfredson T.
settings.quote: "If you’re someone who currently works a full-time job and is looking to make that jump to become a trainer, the NASM online self-study program is the right choice for you. Even with a full-time job, I was able to complete the course in 6 weeks and pass my exam first try!"

settings.name: Mark Lopez
settings.quote: "I chose to get NASM certified because of its in-depth, evidence-based approach, which I knew would greatly benefit my clients."

settings.name: Martin Chan
settings.quote: "I selected NASM certification for its comprehensive and research-driven curriculum, ensuring my clients receive the highest level of expertise."

settings.name: Debora
settings.quote: "For the past six months, I have been studying hard to become a Certified Personal Trainer with NASM, known for its rigorous exam and strong reputation. Before this, I earned a German fitness instructor license (B-Lizenz). I worked in a gym while studying and really liked the NASM content, especially the OPT model."

settings.name: Kevin
settings.quote: "Becoming NASM Certified is a significant milestone for me. It represents the knowledge and skills I’ve acquired, and my dedication to helping others achieve their fitness goals."

settings.name: Vierra G.
settings.quote: "Balancing studying, work, and motherhood was incredibly challenging, but I’m proud to have completed it. This certification enhances my skills for better client service. The Corrective Exercise Specialist course provided advanced techniques for movement impairments, and I’m eager to apply this knowledge to help my clients reach their goals."

settings.name: Joyce
settings.quote: “I wanted to take a moment to express my heartfelt gratitude for the exceptional education and support I have received at NASM. The knowledge and skills I’ve gained here have been invaluable, and I am truly thankful for the dedication and passion of the faculty and staff.”

settings.name: Mahmoud
settings.quote: "I chose the NASM program for its excellent reputation and scientific approach, ensuring I gain the skills to provide top-notch service to my clients. With my NASM certification, I now create personalized training programs to help clients achieve their fitness goals safely and effectively.”

settings.name: Hossam
settings.quote: "I study biochemistry, but my passion is exercise science. Finding NASM was the best choice ever. Completing the course while studying was tough, but it deepened my love for exercise science and equipped me with valuable tools to become a professional personal trainer. Thank you, NASM."

settings.name: Abigail
settings.quote: "I'm officially a NASM-certified personal trainer and deeply grateful for the program's support in passing the CPT exam! I'm excited to use what I've learned to help clients achieve their fitness goals and transform lives. Certification is just the beginning, and I'm ready for what's next!"

settings.name: Natalya
settings.quote: "I am now officially a NASM Certified Personal Trainer. I learned so much from this program. As a Certified Personal Trainer, I can now help people achieve their fitness goals and be the best version of themselves! Thank you to everyone who believed in me and helped me in my journey."

settings.name: Rodrigo
settings.quote: "NASM made this course extremely enjoyable and very informative. I was able to acquire knowledge and skills that will allow me to be a successful personal trainer. I’ve learned so much information that I would love to implement to empower others and help them achieve their goals. I am truly passionate about assisting others in becoming the best versions of themselves and living healthier and happier lives."

settings.name: Marina
settings.quote: “I’ve been a Personal Trainer for 8 years and chose NASM for their reputation and flexible schedule. The certification took 4 months at my own pace and was applicable to both my profession and personal routines. I’m excited to use my new credentials to help people achieve their fitness goals and improve their lifestyles. Thank you, NASM!”

settings.name: Frank
settings.quote: "Training isn't complete without nutrition. For those offering nutritional guidance, the NASM CNC is essential. In my nine years in fitness, it’s been one of the most comprehensive and insightful certifications. The sections on behavior change and coaching skills were transformative. I’m now equipped to assess client needs and provide tailored nutritional coaching for their fitness and lifestyle goals."

settings.name: Savanna
settings.quote: "Enrolling in NASM was one of the best decisions for my career as a Personal Trainer and Sports Nutritionist. The education provided was excellent and equipped me with essential knowledge for the fitness industry. I appreciated the focus on coaching, nutrition, and exercise techniques. Thanks to NASM, I feel empowered to pursue my passion and look forward to further education in fitness, health, and wellness. I highly recommend NASM for expanding your knowledge in the fitness industry."

settings.name: Alex Jung Lee
settings.quote: "Throughout the NASM CPT certification course, I've gained a comprehensive understanding of the intrinsic value associated with health and wellness. I take great pride in successfully achieving the designation of NASM CPT. I am enthusiastic about leveraging my acquired knowledge to support and enhance the well-being of my family, friends, and community as a NASM Certified Personal Trainer."

settings.name: Felicitas Avendaño
settings.quote: "In 2018, I became a NASM Certified Personal Trainer (CPT) and Certified Nutrition Coach (CNC), turning a hobby into a full-time job with a busy schedule across two gyms, online clients, and home visits. Being a nutrition coach has enhanced my ability to help clients and added revenue streams to my business. I’m also proud to have been a gym owner for almost a year, enjoying the responsibility and freedom of leading my own team."

settings.name: Helen
settings.quote: "𝐃𝐫𝐞𝐚𝐦𝐬 💭 𝐝𝐨 𝐜𝐨𝐦𝐞 𝐭𝐫𝐮𝐞...𝐚𝐧𝐝 𝐈 𝐃𝐈𝐃 𝐈𝐓!⁣ Studying at 𝟓𝟕 is so very different than at 𝟏𝟗. Yet very possible.⁣"⁠

settings.name: Darryl
settings.quote: "Time to pass some of this fitness energy down to our youth! Helping to make sure that they play for at least 60 minutes a day."

settings.name: Kenneth
settings.quote: "You can teach an old dog new tricks 😂 something good came out of the pandemic for me!"

settings.title: Canada's Lowest Prices
settings.content: Get the best NASM deals with zero percent interest payment plans. Found an individual NASM course at a lower price elsewhere? Let us know so we can price match and find an even better deal!

settings.title: Dedicated Support Assistant
settings.content: You will be assigned a go-to individual to answer any questions you may have regarding your courses.

settings.title: Apprenticeship Program
settings.content: Receive 40 hours of hands-on client training, a recommendation letter from Jesse Benson, a mentorship session, interview prep and a completion certificate.

settings.section_description: Elevate your career with our wide range of NASM certifications, specialization courses, and bundled packages, Unlock Your Fitness Potential with NPTA!

settings.section_title: More programs you may be interested in
Want to personalize your certification path?
settings.section_description: Contact us to create a custom bundle tailored to your goals in nutrition, personal training, or specialization.
